trends: There have been 23 other sightings in Madison
There were no other sightings in Madison on or around December 4th 2007
Summary: BRILLIANT WHITE CIRCLE;STRAIGHT HORIZONTAL FLIGHT; FAST SPEED
divs: Sighting DetailsLOOKING WEST ABOVE THE TREE TOPS I SAW A CURCULAR BRIGHT WHITE LIGHT TRAVELING DUE NORTH AT A VERY FAST RATE OF SPEED. THERE WAS NO TRAILER VISABLE TO ME. THE LIGHT WAS ON THE LANDING APPROACH OF THE MADISON AIRPORT. I HAVE SEEN NUMEROUS PLANES THRU THERE, BUT NEVER NEAR THE SPEED THAT THE LIGHT TRAVELED. AFTER THE BRIEF MOMENT OF THE SIGHTING I TRIED TO FIND SOME LOGIC IN WHAT I SAW. THERE WAS NO WAY I COULD JUDGE THE DISTANCE OR SIZE. THE SIZE, IF IN MY HAND AT ARMS LENGTH, WAS LIKE A ORANGE. ME.. SEEING A UFO CAN'T BE WAS MY THOUGHT AT THE TIME, HOWERVER, JUST WHAT WAS IT?? ANY IDEAS?? MY LOCATION IS MADISON WI. SIGHTING FROM WEST WINDOW AT 110 SCHENK ST. IT APPEARED TO BE NEAR HWY 151 GOING NORTH. SORRY I MADE NO NOTATION AS TO DATE OR TIMEOF THE EVENT. IT WAS IN EARLY DECEMBER AROUND 8.00 PM
